item.title: 特朗普政府认为将36个国家 /地区添加到旅行禁令名单 - 华盛顿邮报
item.description: 特朗普政府认为添加36个国家/地区的旅行列表＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 wa afghan移民种族与家人团聚，因为旅行禁令开始＆nbsp; Seattle Times Times href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmilwfbvv95cuxobthpws01vlhsrzi2y2y2y2hgmgtcm0owruz1tu5otlgtlgtlgtdenruxlpndenruxlpnghtndjuwwtvnakhezheakhezhezhezhaakhfbc TU2Y09RLXVxQWFXMFladTZYNzh5RDI4SDRmUURuZ09QSkpQVU9BUzFBMDdyMzhZQlNaQWd0Ui0yaTdIRHpSd3M4SHFLWmhRSTBPUVR0cW5tUmhsd3RMLUNFRFVz?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>特朗普的旅行禁令担心克拉克斯顿的索马里难民＆nbsp; nbsp; ajc.com 特朗普旅行禁令：AZ倡导者分享难民家庭的关注href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijwfbvv95cuxqdxhqdxhqoujfbhrxtnrvq1ntcdg3mnnnnn4skrskrsnhjwosnhjwos1kroodv5qnvxvv5qnvxvv G9VWETDNWDYDTQ5EGTIEUEJWSZDPV3LPRU9PDK93WWWTUZ054MTVIRMG5A0NKTUXWC3RMBDA1VURIZMPFCVDWYUUJRC2JWRNDVZERNDVZEVZEVFEFNTJLVNTJLVLVLVLVLVLVLVLVLVLVLVLVLVLVSCWNWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW mlrywhjqvjhovffffffffwdiblafbvv95cuxnzho2qy1uenvsvfkxnddsswmr3rkzhdtc1vhduprv2xkwxvrvrvrvrvrvrvrvrvrvrvrvv3nfvdzybfrwggnbfrwggng9otxrsoenhrsoenhrsoenhrsoenhr0m2z2z2otv 0pvvjjjiCvnmmMJ3OHBFCKVZDEHQTDVACHHNNNKHQOG01OG4WUMVKR3FTNUWYRGHWYRGHWBLFNSDF5RKPYBPYBTIZVMZSDM011E11EHHHHHHHHVZ1ZVC1VC1VC1VC1VC1VC1VC1VWTGVX？ target =“ _ blank”>特朗普的旅行禁令燃料绝望和对密歇根州阿拉伯美国人的政治厌恶

item.title: 特朗普：以色列和伊朗之间的战争应该结束-Axios
item.description: 特朗普：以色列和伊朗之间的战争应结束＆nbsp;＆nbsp; axios 以色列 - 伊朗实时更新：IDF部长警告说，德黑兰将燃烧，'特朗普说，冲突应结束＆nbsp; nbsp; wsj> wsj href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijafbvv95cuxpsps0jwdkizeunitfl6sli0dlfovvo3vdr4zevsaw1zbkrhedfyffyffyrvlyvlyvlyk2berpnu VoaHFBZ2RtREVFQmhmTnVrX0FaSHA3VzVMRG1yN1FOaGFYMmUxMjlWbHRrTXZfdVJ0UXNNSlkzRWV2dFpzTWdCMWtSSmFtWUZwVS1MdmNMQ0E0R0pnZg?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>特朗普在全球爆发中与普京说话href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiiafbvv95cuxpdldryudtz0jzek1yrhptr2nis1ptujvnq0zqnnnzlag1sb1sb3lvwwux6sk5ttt0z emmjdvunqv0pscxr5wunithhtemqwafv2dmjma3dxajlot0zjcm9pvuhqbgvkmnvkmnvn1boqzj4vne5czbtytbytbytbytbytbytbytbyvem5mmpbzv8yafnrcgxaduqgxaduqtff？ Target =“ _ Blank”> Putin和Trump讨论了中东紧张局势，乌克兰在电话上进行了交谈，克里姆林语说 ＆nbsp; ap ap news> ap news <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirgFBVV95cUxOcnJ5QXdmOFFyMml4UWh5Q2s4RVBWM0VLSUpQVXFlZjdSVXBsRzZ0NmRtX0ZSenFmckMwQzNDcGZzNUJmdzY0T uy0dwdpx1v0ajrzq0vrd3lfx2nkqwlyywjcdhptujnmcwd4ukdxn2nwynl2u2u2u2u2u2 hnbgnyvvu3s EPVQJK5EXDNTKNUNF9TMHDODVAXSFL1OGDBQULRSXP3ZE9BCMN0QU5LEJDJDJZVZFU0E？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>普京对特朗普说话，谴责以色列对伊朗的罢工，克里姆林宫说＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS

item.title: 凯尔·斯塔默爵士宣布国家对美容团伙的调查-BBC
item.description: 凯尔·斯塔默（Keir Starmer）爵士宣布国家调查对美容帮派的调查＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc keir starmer启动全国调查，以进行修饰帮派＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiqafbvv95cuxomeoxy0jlce9ncjvoymd1yvvzcthueunqthueunqwxdxdxrnnnqandsohhhhhhgbfppjd22 reze52 reze52 reze5qn2luwwwwex5dj dQa200RWwzcjc5a0w2LW9scnRYdjV1UXQ4UVBTTW5rV1E1OWxYdGhGUnlFNDhxUm0tV1JvWjNzVHQxWHVyX1FXNm9HZ01uMTBjd1QtS3M0dVUwd2pvQ0hoVW5RVFJWbFB iSm1BRWtvc1JaSTnSAa4BQVVfeXFMUC1zRTdKRjF2ZUZXXzRPUDV5Zmx6R0VZYWFnSkxSZ1BNWXBVcHZQck5ILUVXNlV3MmU2OHZWOVNDWVNjRnJRTVVGeUpSWTBBT2NP CDM2N1ZZM3RIBWRXODRRCJRPZEHPNLHHWU5XOGJZREDZRWJVCDLILILNZVWFJXQNB2WAVJNMPRVNHVNHVNHVB3J6J6SNWNWNWNWNETNETNETNETNET target =“ _ blank”>英国宣布在压力之后宣布对'修饰帮派'的调查＆nbsp;＆nbsp; al Jazeera

item.title: 以色列说，它杀死了9位伊朗核科学家，并杀死了伊朗袭击的牙套-NPR
item.description: 以色列说，它杀死了9位伊朗核科学家，并发动了伊朗攻击＆nbsp; nbsp; npr 实时更新：以色列警告'德黑兰将燃烧' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxte44c21bwurocjdldhiythhkcjftnufm X1NXODVDSEVHNFKXWM1ABZR0CKHHHDVDBU2JSRJAYDLO2WXLKQJA5VGG4TMGP2WMHUBLLQB0ZPOHVBNNY4DW？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>'它在心脏上很重：伊朗导弹罢工后的以色列调查损害＆nbsp; bbc 伊朗的重要石油行业在不断升级的冲突中很容易受到伤害＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijafbvv95cuxnwhuxnwhubsohftwfzvntfrmnuwdg9qcv82oxqyzxjgz3p6p6 zzzdqutfrnzg4oxziy1vxm2 NzZXBHd0dXTTZIcXljcVhKWGdLckZGZ2d5WWJ1a1JaNkhsSjM2aUdVRnhRVEZrTUVPaU5zcE9YVkQxbHRYTF9EbmgySG5BLVF4N2ZBTWVidnFRWXRkdw?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>以色列空军在德黑兰领空中实现了运营自由，idf说＆nbsp; nbsp; axios

item.title: 纯粹的奥威尔：欧洲谴责伊朗在其自己领土上的袭击 - 负责任的股权
item.description: 纯奥威尔：欧洲谴责伊朗在自己的领土上发动攻击＆nbsp; nbsp; 负责的statecraft 英国在G7会议之前的仔细外交面孔测试＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 摘要：欧洲只有一个选择伊朗＆nbsp;＆nbsp; euractiv

item.title: 当特朗普参加G7峰会时，其他世界领导人的目标是表明他们没有受到威胁 - 美联社新闻
item.description: 随着特朗普进入G7峰会，其他世界领导者的目标是表明他们没有被吓倒＆nbsp; nbsp; ap news 对特朗普参加的G7峰会有什么了解href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiqgfbvv95cuxqwk9suxnmctflsjhnu1fzelrwzmhvajjjiq0hyuuuuwhqrvi4bkper3fdetlaafdzcggffffzmhvajjiq0 hyuuuhvajjjiq0hyu VMXFIYZJNR1H5NDLHQNDYC3NKX0XWVWWJICHH4N0J4WE5NBLPJWTZHBMXGMXGMWKMWKZDWPFRK5YVMMITWMIMETWMITWMMITWMMITWKTVRZF1 0jumlrxv3d6eu1vudibrwfbvv95cuxqowpys2ximm8td2cwwwutwyvrlbvjwa3b6qkk04wfjgluvrntvorntvorntvorvrntvorvv0havdhdhsm5blzpse9xblrud1nuulznef5nuulznef5nuulznef5mtrraxnulznef5mtr.nuulznef5mtr.1huulznef5mtr.alznef5mtr.alznef5mtr.alznef5m缩5rgnonfdiznlycdzjndb6muv4cnawdfnuvnuvnpktjvsvujsnnnn1zunjv2zkmdzantqzbdy5amtmwkluuhjhjhwyhwyhwyhwyhwywyhwysvjhwyvwqljasnnznzkzzkzzkzkzkzr1znznznznnznsn1ssjdr1sjdr1sjdr1sjdr1sjdir1sjdir1sjdir1sjdivi os sjdivi os sjdivi.cjdivivi os os target =“ _ blank”>伊朗 - 以色列的紧张局势和不可预测的特朗普，占主导地位g7 ＆nbsp; nbsp; al href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmibefvx3lxtfazywlqunfbc1fhamrsv25oafn4cwlkbnfmqudqahv5 ZHNTVUSWYXUXWVSRKDIB09YBDHPVW52CNP0M0M0JKBKBKKBKKBKFRQUXDSNHXETFRWLLIZMZFTLE5AFPALURRV3DLMJJQCCTCFM0TQ？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>特朗普的第一任G7是紧张的。今年可能会继续这种趋势＆nbsp; npr G7峰会上的领导人需要挑战特朗普而又不加挑战＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者

item.title: 印度航空印度崩溃后，印度对波音787的检查进行了检查-CNN
item.description: 印度在空气崩溃后启动对波音787的检查＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqgFBVV95cUxQbS0taXk4YjFkclpUNFFjSk42QVNJaTNZUThiZkpIYks0U0Z2ZFBObmsxdkd4dERfSWRtLS1FVUFRblNDTX fpyjbksjhgy0dwvu9ix3zsawflrgdnoe9vvdhobwkyd002nlqts0hqccvuz1pmuhl0q1c4t mrhcgdqc2pub2dsbfdvnmdwu2rksefnogrvelz6z2vvsggzulrgnldvmtr4t1uzzw？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>座位11A中的乘客如何成为印度空气崩溃的唯一幸存者＆nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxte9mxfhrklxvvv3xju0xju09qz3zbmk05 WMQ4NXHFN2NVU3DMTUS0ALHONUOZVZV1D1VEUNFICECTWKXLVZLVZLVZLVZLVZTTFYOHRLLYNYB05YRMPPQLKTDW？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>在莱斯特支付的致敬印度在印度空中遇到的夫妇＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc '我刚走了出去'：印度空气崩溃的唯一幸存者分享了他的故事＆nbsp; npr 年轻的姐妹孤儿当父亲在印度空气中死亡，一边在散布母亲的灰烬之后飞来飞去＆nbsp; 纽约邮报
